reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater incredibly soft with a silky fabric, and appreciate its adorable print and great workmanship.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Be sure to order down a couple of sizes as it runs VERY large!
items.body: I gave the sweaters 5 stars. The only problem is it runs VERY large. The Medium i received could easily be a standard XL. However, it is beautiful and very soft. I returned the medium and reordered it in a small which I suspect will be generous in size but it doesnt come in XS. I'll update my review after I receive the smaller size. It did have a heavy perfume fragrance to it though it was packaged as if it had never been opened. I'll he interested to see if the new will has the same smell. Read more
items.author: MAllen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Super Super Soft!! Runs true to size.
items.body: I absolutely love this incredibly super SOFT sweater! First of all, the design - I have this in the polar bear and it's so fun! The grandkids love it, my young adult daughter loves it, the teens love it - I love it! Very unique design, just what I like to find. Second of all, it's so soft and comfy. The perfect sweater for cooler weather, it feels wonderful. SIZE: I have this in my usual size Medium and it fits great - but I'll be super careful washing it. It's not as long as depicted in the picture, but with a longer thin tank under it I'm able to wear it with leggings and feel like my backside (where I carry my weight) is sufficiently covered. It does have a fuller fit in the sleeves and all around, which is very forgiving but doesn't look sloppy. For reference I wear a Medium in tops and dresses. I'm 5'4" tall, 36B bust, about 180# and carry my weight in my hips and backside. Read more
items.author: Musicbookfan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This top is very beautiful!
items.body: I actually wash every piece of clothing I buy before I wear it. I washed this top on gentle cycle by itself, & tumbled it in the dryer for 20 minutes, then lay it flat to dry. It turned out perfect! I would have bought more of this type top from this company, however couldn’t find another print I liked enough to spend what it cost! However, this top is worth every penny! I love it! It is incredibly soft! It didn’t shrink, & held it’s color and shape! Read more
items.author: Nancy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't forget to order a size or two down
items.body: The sweaters are very nice super soft but they run very large! I got a medium and it fits perfect but I normally wear an XL Read more
items.author: Lisa Celestin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised!
items.body: You know......I bought this as a "let's see how this turns out". I was skeptical, but after receiving it, I really like it. It is loud and very different but I need 1 or 2 pieces in my wardrobe that is bit fun and not a staple piece. Can I just comment on the softness?!?!?. It is like a warm blanket to wrap in. I ordered a small, it is a longer fit, but not too long. Just enough to cover the backside if you want to wear it with leggings. I am pleasantly surprised and I will keep it. The $5 price made me try it! LOL Read more
items.author: Carissa Harrington

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizes
items.body: I absolutely love the various sweaters by this company. I have purchased about 7 of them over the years, and they are all unique, beautiful, and extremely comfortable. You can wash them in delicate cycle and they come out like brand new. They are supposed to be oversized sweater in style and I wear size medium. The problem I encountered is the most recent purchase. The sweater I ordered was labeled wrong. It was labeled M but much larger than my other sweaters. It had to be size Large but mislabelled as medium. I called customer services and requested a replacement and made a special request that they comment on the size issue so the seller will check the size before they ship it out. Well, I got a replacement, exactly the same issue with size. I am so disappointed and frustrated. They need to improve their quality control!! Read more
items.author: Mykc

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roomy, great kitty colors. It’s like wearing a fuzzy pillow. I love it.
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
items.body: Oh my gosh! This sweater is so super soft and comfortable. Great quality. Definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: BHappy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-christmas Tree, Cat02, Flower01, Flower04, Snow Man, A-cat01, Bear, Eye, Lose Leaves Cats, Face 1, Fish, Art 1, Rose 1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
